Comment 5: 
Rather than piling on even more heuristics, perhaps we should just drop the colon-based
indent/outdent, and leave that to gofmt. Jump labels are pretty rare, and I don't think
it's too big a deal to end up with an extra indent when doing case labels. Or maybe it
can be simpler and only do the indent if the previous line ends with a colon, and starts
with "case" (modulo whitespace).
_Owner changed to @dsymonds._
